title: Queso Panela with Ranchitas Nacho Queso
instructions: Step 1. Heat enough oil in a pot or deep fryer.
Step 2. Coat the cheese with flour, then with the beaten egg, and finally with Ranchitas.
Step 3. Fry it in the oil for a few minutes.
Step 4. Remove from the oil and let it drain on a plate lined with paper towels.
description: Panela cheese fried until golden and crispy, served with Ranchitas Nacho Queso. An irresistible appetizer.
